Translations.Text: Qom-e-firaon mein jo sardar log thay unhon ney kaha kay waqaee yeh shaks bara maahir jadoogar hai
Yeh chahata hai kay tum ko tumhari sir zamin say bahir ker dey so tum log kiya mashwara detay ho
Unhon ney kaha aap inn ko aur inn kay bhai ko mohlat dijiye aur shehron mein harkaaron ko bhej dijiye
Kay woh sab maahir jadoogaron ko aap kay pass laa ker hazir ker den
Aur woh jadoogar firaon kay pass hazir huye kehney lagay kay agar hum ghalib aaye to hum ko koi bara sila milay ga
Firaon ney kaha kay haan aur tum muqarrab logon mein shamil hojao gay
Unn saahiron ney araz kiya aey musa! Khuwa aap daaliye aur ya hum hi daalen
(musa alh-e-salam) ney farmaya kay tum hi dalo pur jab unhon ney dala to logon ki nazar bandi ker di aur unn per haibat ghalib ker di aur aik tarah ka bara jadoo dikhlaya
Aur hum ney (alh-e-salam) ko hukum diya kay apna asa daal dijiye! So asa ka daalna tha kay uss ney unn kay saray banay banaye khel ko nigalna shuroo kiya
Pus haq zahir hogaya aur unhon ney jo kuch banaya tha sab jata raah
Pus woh log uss moqay per haar gaye aur khoob zaleel hoker phiray
Aur woh jo saahir thay sajday mein gir gaye
Kehney lagay hum eman laye rabbul aalameen per
Jo musa aur haroon ka bhi rab hai

Firaon kehney laga tum musa per eman laye hobaghair iss kay kay mein tum ko ijazat doon? Be-shak yeh saazish thi jiss per tumhara amal daramad hua hai iss shehar mein takay tum sab iss shehar say yahan kay rehney walon ko bahir nikal do. So abb tum ko haqeeqat maloom hui jati hai
Mein tumharay aik taraf kay haath aur doosri taraf kay paon kaaton ga. Phir tum sab ko sooli per latka doon ga
Unhon ney jawab diya kay hum (marr ker) apney maalik hi kay pass jayen gay

Aur tu ney hum mein konsa aib dekha hai ba-juz isskay kay hum apney rab per eman ley aaye jab woh humaray pass aaye. Aey humaray rab! Humaray upper sabar ka faizan farma aur humari jaan halat-e-islam per nikal
